img_summary: The image depicts a plant with white, spherical buds, likely representing an in-game ingredient from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, the plant is part of a guide detailing collectible ingredients and their locations in the game. It is categorized alongside other items like the Fire Bellflower, Celestial Pear, Golden Lotus, and Withered Silkworm, which are found in specific areas and serve as resources for gameplay progression.
